name: app-contract-call
description:
NEAR Apps Contract

This project contains implementation of log backed by blockchain, written in Rust.

scripts.build:contract: yarn build:contract:app && yarn build:contract:make_wallet && yarn build:contract:nft
scripts.deploy:contract: yarn deploy:contract:app && yarn deploy:contract:make_wallet && yarn deploy:contract:nft
scripts.postdeploy:contract: source .env.local && near call $NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NAME add_contract '{"contract_name": "'$NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NAME_MAKE_WALLET'"}' --accountId $NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NAME && echo 'NODE_ENV=testnet' >> .env && echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_NODE_ENV=testnet' >> .env.local
scripts.build:contract:app: set -e & cd ../contract/app && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:contract:make_wallet: set -e & cd ../contract/app-wallet-creation && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:contract:nft: set -e & cd ../contract/app-nft && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.deploy:contract:app: near dev-deploy res/app.wasm --init && cp ./neardev/dev-account.env .env && echo '' >> .env && source .env && echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NAME='$CONTRACT_NAME > .env.local && echo '' >> .env.local
scripts.deploy:contract:make_wallet: source .env && near create-account make-wallet.$CONTRACT_NAME --initialBalance 10 --masterAccount $CONTRACT_NAME && near deploy make-wallet.$CONTRACT_NAME --wasmFile res/app_wallet_creation.wasm && echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NAME_MAKE_WALLET=make-wallet.'$CONTRACT_NAME >> .env.local
scripts.deploy:contract:nft: source .env && near create-account app_nft.$CONTRACT_NAME --initialBalance 10 --masterAccount $CONTRACT_NAME && near deploy app_nft.$CONTRACT_NAME --wasmFile res/app_nft.wasm && echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NAME_NFT=nft.'$CONTRACT_NAME >> .env.local
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn deploy:contract && gh-pages -d dist/
scripts.dev: yarn build:contract && yarn deploy:contract && yarn dev:web
